alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Northwest Pinal County; San Carlos; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 09 at 1:08AM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s expected. * WHERE...Southeast Valley/Queen Creek, Superior, Northwest Pinal County, Apache Junction/Gold Canyon, Tonto Basin, San Carlos, Dripping Springs and Globe/Miami. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM MST this morning. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Northwest Pinal County; San Carlos; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; Tonto Basin
